entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 a.m. PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -3.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 6:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to a few rain showers or wet flurries near noon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries later this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
